column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I narrowed it down to the chocolate croissant
column2: and a dish that I cannot for the life of me remember the name of
column3: but it consisted of blackened shrimp
column6: and (* I believe*) an english muffin.  OUTFREAKINGSTANDING.   I had a REALLY hard time sharing this with my husband - call me stingy.
